column4: Take time to relax in our bespoke Double Room. Your comfort will be guaranteed with a large double bed, complimentary bathroom products, study desk, TV with streaming services and a coffee machine.
Spend quality time with those you love in the sublime comfort of our Double Deluxe Room. Featuring two double beds, large TV with access to streaming services, mini bar and coffee machine.

Our Sudio Apartment with a view is made modern through the use of a neutral palette and wood, offering a residential feel in the heart of the city. You can choose between city views with the sunrise or city views with the sunset.
The curved lines of thi stunning Suite offers a tranquil departure from the bustling city and includes private Butler service

The epitome of sophistication, our Presidential Suite offers an impressive city view, multiple rooms including separate lounge, study area, bathroom with heated floor, dressing room and luxury bathroom essentials. It also includes a private Butler service.
